tier1.key_insight: High concentration of VP of Revenue Operations roles primarily from unknown source in B2B SaaS industry.

tier2.key_insight: High concentration of Sales Operations Manager roles primarily from unknown source in Analytics industry.

tier3.key_insight: High concentration of Sales Development Representative roles primarily from unknown source in Consumer Tech industry.

cross_segment_insights: VIP/Tier 1 leads represent 40.0% of the batch - prioritize for AE review. 'unknown' is the dominant lead source across tiers. Top industries across segments: B2B SaaS, Technology, Analytics.
recommended_campaign_strategy: TIER 1 (2 leads): High-touch personalized sequences with AE involvement. Each email should reference specific company/role context. | TIER 2 (2 leads): Value-proposition focused sequences with case studies. Moderate personalization with source-based hooks. | TIER 3 (1 leads): Educational nurture sequences. Template-based with minimal personalization, focus on volume.
